short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide cursors, selections, comments, and presence avatars of other users

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to hide the comments, cursors, and selections of other users in a Google Doc, which helps you to focus on the main content, rather than distracted by other users' comments and moving cursors.
